Title: Relates to the liability of a municipality or governmental subdivision for the refund of property taxes to the Long Island power authority
Summary: Relates to the liability of a municipality or governmental subdivision for the refund of property taxes to the Long Island power authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1020-q, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the liability of a municipality or governmental subdivision for the refund of property taxes to the Long Island power authority
